Comment: Leadership doesn't share product roadmap updates early enough.
Great commission structure this quarter.
Burnout is real but the team is supportive.
I feel out of the loop on major pivots.
Best team culture I have ever worked in.
Zendesk integration is still buggy.
Management decisions feel like they happen in a vacuum.
I see a clear path to Senior AE here.
Too many 'syncs' that could have been an email.
Why are we hearing about the layoff from news and not Slack?
I love that I can own my projects.
Manual ticket routing is slow.
Communication from the top is 2 weeks late usually.
Health insurance plan is solid.
Daily standups take 45 minutes for no reason.
Better than my last job but could be clearer.
The sales floor energy is unmatched.
Hard to disconnect on weekends.
Total lack of visibility into why the CTO left.
Promoted to Lead recently, feeling good.
